jokes.name: Justin Benito
jokes.joke: Yen da computer slow-ah iruku? Because it's taking a byte time!

jokes.name: Priya Sharma
jokes.joke: Teacher: 'What's the Tamil word for attention?' Student: 'Kavalam sir!'

jokes.name: Karthik Raja
jokes.joke: Appa: 'Son, nee enna panra?' Son: 'Nothing dad, just chillin' with my friends-ah!'

jokes.name: Divya Krishna
jokes.joke: Friend: 'Dude, cinema ticket book panniya?' Me: 'Nope, but I booked myself some disappointment!'

jokes.name: Arun Kumar
jokes.joke: Wife: 'Honey, grocery shopping poganum' Husband: 'Seri darling, but remember our budget is on a diet too!'

jokes.name: Meera Lakshmi
jokes.joke: Boss: 'Why are you late today?' Employee: 'Sir, traffic-la stuck aayiten... mentally!'

jokes.name: Suresh Babu
jokes.joke: Mom: 'Sapadu ready, vaa!' Me from my room: 'Coming ma!' *continues scrolling*

jokes.name: Deepika Raj
jokes.joke: Auto driver: 'Meter la pogalam' Passenger: 'Anna, that's the first joke of the day!'

jokes.name: Vikram Patel
jokes.joke: Student: 'Sir, assignment submit panna time extend pannunga' Professor: 'Time-ah extend panna mudiyum, but your marks-ah extend panna mudiyathu!'

jokes.name: Anitha Devi
jokes.joke: Friend: 'Bro, gym join pannalama?' Me: 'Bro, first let me join my scattered life together!'

jokes.name: Ravi Chandran
jokes.joke: Girlfriend: 'Naan beautiful-ah irukena?' Boyfriend: 'Baby, you're so beautiful, even my wallet runs away when it sees you!'

jokes.name: Kavya Reddy
jokes.joke: Cricket match-la India losing. Dad: 'Ithellam script-oda nadakuthu. WWE-la madhiri!'

jokes.name: Muthu Selvam
jokes.joke: Doctor: 'Daily exercise pannunga' Patient: 'Doctor, remote control press pannrathu exercise illaya?'

jokes.name: Shalini Thomas
jokes.joke: Neighbor: 'Unga dog romba cute-ah iruku!' Me: 'Thank you! But that's my brother!'

jokes.name: Ashwin Narayanan
jokes.joke: Bank manager: 'Sir, unga account balance negative-la iruku' Customer: 'Sir, at least something is consistent in my life!'
